comments:
I had installed the ssh/gdbserver plugin from bug 137839.
I had created a connection with the SystemType ssh/gdbserver.

Now I quit RSE, close the project for ssh/gdbserver, so the SystemType is not known any more. When I restart RSE, I get

I believe this was fixed with another bug I worked on. Can you please verify?
